xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 07 August 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 06:52 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 07:17 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:24 <bvancea_> has joined #medsavant 10:03 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 13:10 <Jim^> has joined #medsavant 13:16 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:41 <bvancea_> hey sdumitriu1 14:41 <bvancea_> what's up 14:42 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea_ 14:42 <sdumitriu1> Working on installers 14:42 <bvancea_> for medsavant? 14:42 <sdumitriu1> No, for Savant 14:42 <bvancea_> still busy with the release 14:42 <bvancea_> ? 14:42 <bvancea_> oh 14:42 <sdumitriu1> Then comes MedSavant 14:43 <sdumitriu1> Yes, almost all the bugs are fixed 14:43 <bvancea_> nice 14:44 <sdumitriu1> Jim^ is working on the remaining ones 14:44 <bvancea_> I see, pretty nice 14:44 <bvancea_> so, Savant is going to be released as well? 14:44 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:45 <sdumitriu1> It's a pre-requirement since it's a dependency of MedSavant 14:46 <bvancea_> yeah, I've noticed some imports 14:46 <bvancea_> pointing to Savant jars 14:52 <bvancea_> well, I'm leaving tomorrow on the hiking trip. should be back by monday/tuesday 14:52 <sdumitriu1> Great 14:52 <sdumitriu1> have fun 14:53 <bvancea_> thanks :) 14:53 <bvancea_> did you manage to check my code? or too busy? 14:53 <sdumitriu1> Not yet... 14:53 <sdumitriu1> Trying to get the release out 14:54 <bvancea_> its okay, focus on that 14:55 <bvancea_> and maybe we can discuss the code next week, if you have time 14:56 <Jim^> I think I've addressed all the bugs I can 14:57 <Jim^> The "Medsavant does not always quit" bug is Mac specific - I can't reproduce it. 14:57 <Jim^> I should ask Marc about hte other issue, which will require editing the Savant source code. 15:02 <Jim^> It seems like an easy fix, I just don't have the Savant code. Do we have a repository for it? 15:03 <sdumitriu1> Yes, it's on GitHub 15:03 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/savant 15:03 <Jim^> Ah OK, I found all our other projects now too 15:03 <Jim^> ok 15:03 <Jim^> I'll take a look at this one 15:03 <sdumitriu1> Great 17:05 <phenotips_org> has joined #medsavant 20:18 <Jim^> has joined #medsavant
